summary: Allows companions to die much more easily.
descriptionHtml:
A simple mod to make companions no longer fall to a knee when seriously injured. Version, so comments, criticisms, etc are appreciated.  Now, they should simply die instead of regenerating unless dealt a killing blow.


I\'ve changed the following companions (listed in no particular order):

- All Housecarls
- Vorstag
- Stenvar
- Golldir
- Belrand
- Erik the Slayer
- Jenassa
- Marcurio
- Aranea Ienith
- Eola
- Illia
- Kharjo

As a note, many of the companions also have the Essential tag.  I did not change this on any of those affected NPCs.  They are still invincible until they become unessential through quest progression.

Feedback is always appreciated.
author: FireMaster
